sentences.sContent: She is becoming famous in Australia and elsewhere.
sentences.sCn: 她在澳大利亚和其他地方渐渐出名了。

sentences.sContent: Kerala has less crime and alcoholism than elsewhere in India.
sentences.sCn: 喀拉拉邦的犯罪和酗酒现象少于印度的其他地区。

sentences.sContent: ...Neither do the foods sold at a snack-bar or those foods available elsewhere in the school...

trans.tranOther: in, at, or to another place
